## External validity
To what extent does the value in the surveillance system correspond to reality
Closely realted to accuracy: how close do we come to reality

### How to measure
- Difficult to measure
- Causal realation

### Examples
- If we want to record deaths by heatstroke
- Some physicians missclassify diseases

## Internal validtiy
- The amount of coding errors
